scss/utils/_mixins.scss

[private] position 

@mixin position($position, $args: ()) { ... }

Description

Shorthand for positioning.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$position

Position type (either absolute, fixed or relative)

 String —
$args

List of offsets and values

 List ()

Throws

  • Invalid value $next for offset $offset.

Requires

  • is-valid-length

Used by

  • absolute
  • relative
  • fixed

Links

  • Documentation

Found at

triangle 

@mixin triangle($direction, $position, $color: currentcolor, $size: 1em) { ... }

Description

Mixin to fake CSS triangles with border hacks.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$direction

Triangle direction

 String —
$position

Triangle position

 List —
$color

Triangle color

 Color currentcolor
$size

Triangle size

 Number 1em

Throws

  • Direction must be one of top, right, bottom or left.

Requires

  • absolute
  • size
  • opposite-direction
  • z

Found at

scss/utils/_mixins.scss

prefixer 

@mixin prefixer($property, $value, $vendors: webkit moz ms o) { ... }

Description

Mixin to prefix properties that are not prefixed by Compass

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$property

Property to prefix

 String —
$value

Value for property

 Any —
$vendors

Vendor prefixes to output

 List webkit moz ms o

Example

 @include prefixer('transform', 'translate(10px)');

Found at

scss/utils/_mixins.scss

opacity 

@mixin opacity($opacity) { ... }

Description

Mixin for cross-browser opacity (IE 8).
Clamps the value between 0 and 1.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$opacity

Opacity level, between 0 and 1

 Number —

opposite-direction 

@function opposite-direction($directions) { ... }

Description

Returns the opposite direction of every direction in $directions.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$directions

Positions to revert

 List —

Returns

List, Null

Throws

  • No opposite direction found for $direction.

Used by

  • triangle

@function clamp($value, $min, $max) { ... }

Description

Clamp $value between $min and $max.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$value

Value to clamp between $min and $max

 Number —
$min

Minimum value

 Number —
$max

Maximum value

 Number —

Returns

Number, Null

Throws

  • All parameters must be numbers for clamp.

Used by

  • opacity

Found at

scss/utils/_functions.scss

z 

@function z($layer) { ... }

Description

Helper to manage z-index.
Tries to fetch the z-index mapped to $layer in $z-indexes map.
If found, returns it, else returns null.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$layer

Layer

 String —

Returns

Number, Null

Example

z-index: z("default")

Throws

  • No z-index found for $layer.

Requires

  • z-indexes

Used by

  • triangle

Found at

scss/utils/_functions.scss

color 

@function color($color) { ... }

Description

Color getter.

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$color

Color to fetch

 String —

Returns

Color, Null

Example

color: color("pink");

Throws

  • No color found for $color. Please make sure it is defined in $colors map.

Requires

  • colors

Found at

scss/utils/_functions.scss

Variables

colors 

$colors: (
  "pink":         #c6538c,
  
  "light-purple": #e9e4f1,
  "purple":       #998099,
  
  "green":        #699,

  "light-grey":   #f7f5fa,
  "medium-grey":  #ddd,
  "dark-grey":    #444
) !global;

Description

Map of colors for quick grabbing.
See _functions.scss -> color() function.

Type

Map

Used by

  • color

Found at

scss/utils/_variables.scss

breakpoints 

$breakpoints: (
  "small":  (max-width: 600px),
  "medium": (min-width: 601px)
) !global;

Description

Map of breakpoints for responsive design.
See _functions.scss -> respond-to() function.

Type

Map

Used by

  • respond-to

scss/utils/_variables.scss

z-indexes 

$z-indexes: (
  "goku"       9001,
  "modal"      5000,
  "dropdown"   4000,
  "social"     3000,
  "default"       1,
  "below"        -1
) !global;

Description

Z-indexes layers.
See _functions.scss -> z() function.

Type

Map

Used by

  • z

Found at

scss/utils/_variables.scss
